roleset.name: affix a signature

example.name: historical
example.text: John's great-uncle Fred signed the Declaration of Independence--unfortunately, in 1924.

example.name: with explicit signature
example.text: One writer signed his letter as "Red blooded, balanced male".

roleset.note: Frames file for 'sign' based on big corpus. Comparison with 'write'. Member of VNcls image_impression-25.1.

roleset.name: enter into an agreement

example.name: agreement
example.text: First Constitution has signed a merger agreement with WFRR LP and GHKM Corp.
example.arg: with WFRR LP and GHKM Corp.

example.name: no co-signer
example.text: An ultimatum: *trace* either sign new long-term commitments to buy future episodes, or don't.
example.arg: new long-term commitments to buy future episodes

example.name: sign to
example.text: John was signed to the Mudville Giants.
example.note: The logic here is that John is the cosigner of an agreement, underwhich he will play with the Mudville Giants. Maybe it makes sense,maybe it doesn't. Maybe it will occur, maybe it won't.

example.name: nominal rel: signing
example.text: When Ma Ying - jeou resumed its " reign " four years ago , he worked actively to make up for the time squandered by the DPP , and the signing of the Economic Cooperation Framework Agreement -LRB- ECFA -RRB- was the biggest highlight .
example.arg: of the Economic Cooperation Framework Agreement -LRB- ECFA -RRB-

roleset.note: These two senses would be easy to merge, since the assumption is that anyagreement is based upon a signature on a piece of paper. Nominal 'signing' based on BOLT-7. VN class hire-13.5.3, but this only fits certain instances listed under this roleset.

predicate.note: Note: 'robosign' (incl. 'robo-sign' and 'robo sign') has its own frame.

roleset.name: sign up: enroll, enter

example.name: non-agentive
example.text: Only four securtities firms have signed up with the Bog Board to buy and sellESPs as market makers.
example.arg: to buy and sell ESPs as market makers

example.name: agentive
example.text: Whittle said its field staff signed up the 500 schools in 238 school districts.

roleset.note: Member of VNcls hire-13.5.3. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.

roleset.name: sign on: become associated with

example.name: unnamed arg1
example.text: Mr. Lorenzo, 49 years old, is reclaiming the job that was his before Mr. Corr signed on.

example.name: with arg1
example.text: If it finds one of those passwords, Mr. Alexander said, the worm will do such things as change users' passwords to a series of random numbers, preventing them-1 from [*]-1 signing on to the network.

roleset.note: Member of Vncls hire-13.5.3, but this roleset is incompatible with the VN structure, where agent is boss and signed-on is employee, and it's opposite here. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.

roleset.name: sign_off: give stamp of approval

role.descr: entity being given stamp of approval
for what, second part of arg1

example.name: all args
example.text: A new ' govt backed ' review has concluded that GP's should be stripped of the power *PRO* to sign patients off on long term sick .

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: The publisher signed off on the book and sent it to be printed.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

roleset.name: check in
roleset.note: Based on Bolt SMS data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.name: parental arg 0
example.text: John signed his daughter in at day care before rushing of to work.

example.name: guard at the door as arg 0
